title: Scrummy, yummy omelette
ingredients: ['2 eggs', 'splash of milk', 'cooking oil for frying', '1 tablespoon chopped onion (cooking or spring onion, what ever you have)', '2 tablespoons chopped, de-seeded tomato', '2 tablespoons chopped sandwich ham (or chicken of you prefer)', '2 tablespoons grated cheese', '1 tablespoon sweetcorn kernels']
